summary: When the sheriff's son is placed on trial for murdering a stagecoach driver, the sheriff desperately searches for the real killer - and finds the trail leads back to his boy.
cast: Sterling Hayden|Constance Ford|John Dehner|Kent Taylor|Darryl Hickman|Walter Sande|Frank Ferguson|King Donovan|Mort Mills|Peter Miller|Kathleen Nolan|I. Stanford Jolley|Will Wright|Ray Walker|Robert B. Williams|Marjorie Bennett|Paul Brinegar|Ralph Bucko|John Cason|George DeNormand|Kenne Duncan|Byron Foulger|Roy Gordon|Tim Graham|Greta Granstedt|Al Haskell|Whitey Hughes|Jack Kenney|Cliff Lyons|Carl Mathews|Joe McGuinn|Frank Moran|Jimmy Noel|Earl Parker|Jack Perrin|William 'Bill' Phillips|Dan Riss|Buddy Roosevelt|Tom Smith|Ferris Taylor|Bob Terhune|Sammee Tong|Jack Tornek|Felipe Turich
title: The Iron Sheriff
